title: MUAH CHEE (GLUTINOUS RICE SNACK WITH PEANUT & SUGAR)
directions: Combine the chopped peanuts with sugar and mix well.
Place the glutinous rice flour, sea salt, peanut oil, and water in a non-stick pan. Mix until the batter is smooth.

Cook the batter on low heat until the it thickens. Then gather and spread the thick batter until a smooth dough has form. When the dough is ready, remove from the heat. Spoon some peanut mixtures into the pan. Cut the dough into smaller pieces with a rubber spatula. Coat the small pieces of dough with the peanut mixtures. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 2 Tsp of Peanut or Shallot Oil
1/2 Cup of Roasted Peanuts, finely ground
